name: elsa-data-backend
description: The backend that serves HTML/API for Elsa Data

author.name: University of Melbourne Centre for Cancer Research

scripts.//watch:*: Nodemon run (i.e. source watch / auto restart) the dev application with configuration for a Mac or Linux
scripts.watch:mac: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.mac nodemon src/entrypoint.ts web-server-with-scenario 1
scripts.watch:linux: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.linux nodemon src/entrypoint.ts web-server-with-scenario 1
scripts.watch:aws: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.aws nodemon src/entrypoint.ts web-server-with-scenario 1
scripts.//dev:*: Run the dev application (no source watch or restart) with configuration for a Mac or Linux
scripts.dev:mac: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.mac node --loader ts-node/esm -r dotenv/config src/entrypoint.ts web-server-with-scenario 1
scripts.dev:linux: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.linux node --loader ts-node/esm -r dotenv/config src/entrypoint.ts web-server-with-scenario 1
scripts.dev:aws: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.aws node --loader ts-node/esm -r dotenv/config src/entrypoint.ts web-server-with-scenario 1
scripts.//typecheck: Use the Typescript compiler for a compile of the complete src/test/types (no code generated or run)
scripts.//edgemigration: Creates a migration script based on the difference between the current db and schema file
scripts.//edgemigrate: Brings the current db up to date
scripts.//edgetypes: Generates Typescript classes that match the schema of the *current* project EdgeDb
scripts.edgetypes: generate queries --file && generate edgeql-js && generate interfaces
scripts.//test: Run Jest across the full test suite
scripts.test:blank: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.minimum node --loader ts-node/esm -r dotenv/config src/entrypoint.ts db-blank
scripts.//postinstall: Give us the ability to locally patch packages after install
